issue.title: [Rust] Remove UB on parquet crate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10804](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10804). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While trying to remove the unsafe `FatPtr`, I stumbled upon the borrow checker not allowing the code to compile, which suggests that the `FatPtr` is being used to bypass the borrow checked, which I do not think is intentional.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10804?focusedCommentId=17250114) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8829
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8829>
